1753: United Kingdom means England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man. Unlawful Association means any organisation which is engaged in Act of Terrorism and includes an organisation which at any time is a proscribed organisation within the meaning of the Northern Ireland (Emergency Provisions) Act 1973 or any amendment thereto. Unoccupied 1. For the purpose of residential Insured Property, means where the whole or part of the property is not lived in by the tenant, or a person authorised by the Insured for any period of more than 30 (thirty) consecutive days. 2. For the purposes of non-residential Insured Property, means closed for Business or not occupied for its usual Business purposes, for any period of more than 30 (thirty) consecutive days.
